subtitle: This is similar to an American chowder.

method.text: Heat the butter and chopped bacon rinds in a large saucepan. Add the bacon and onions. Cook for 5 min, stirring frequently. Add the tomatoes and potatoes and cook for 5 min. Then remove and discard the bacon rinds.
Pour the stock into the pan. Cover and simmer for 10 min.
Cut the orange roes or corals from the scallops. Slice these and the white fish. Add the white fish to the soup with the parsley and a little seasoning. Simmer gently for 5 min.
Add the cream and sliced roes just before serving the soup. Heat through for 1 min.

title: Scallop broth
